thread.title: Steve Harvey tweets his first response to the Oscars best picture flub
thread.title_full: Steve Harvey tweets his first response to the Oscars best picture flub

author: Los Angeles Times
title: Steve Harvey tweets his first response to the Oscars best picture flub
text:
Feb. 27, 2017, 4:26 a.m. Steve Harvey tweets his first response to the Oscars best picture flub Los Angeles Times 
If you thought Steve Harvey would stay quiet about the best picture mix-up at Sunday's Oscars ceremony, you don't know Steve Harvey. He sent out an early-morning tweet mock-innocently asking of the Oscars, "What I miss?" 
And never one to miss a great promo, he's promising to share his response to the Oscars fiasco with listeners who tune into his radio show Monday at 8 a.m. ET. Because, as he tweeted about the flub that mistakenly gave "La La Land" the prize over true winner "Moonlight, "You know I have something to say." Latest updates
